mindustry.ai.formations

Interface SlotAssignmentStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoundedSlotAssignmentStrategy, DistanceAssignmentStrategy, FreeSlotAssignmentStrategy, SoftRoleSlotAssignmentStrategy

    public interface SlotAssignmentStrategy
    This interface defines how each FormationMember is assigned to a slot in the Formation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int calculateNumberOfSlots(arc.struct.Seq<SlotAssignment> assignments)
      Calculates the number of slots from the assignment data.
      void removeSlotAssignment(arc.struct.Seq<SlotAssignment> assignments, int index)
      Removes the slot assignment at the specified index.
      void updateSlotAssignments(arc.struct.Seq<SlotAssignment> assignments)
      Updates the assignment of members to slots
